alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:55PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Box Elder County through 545 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Howell, or 9 miles west of Tremonton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tremonton, Howell, Garland, Bothwell, Thatcher and Penrose. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 379 and 383. Interstate 84 between mile markers 23 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
